ModMetaData.name: Archotech Power Armor
ModMetaData.author: GeckoBoyer
ModMetaData.description:
A 1.5 update to Archotech Power Armor, no previous version compatibility though Quite a few stat and recipe changes, an armor texture switch-around, description updates, and some code TLC
[h1]Features:[/h1] - 2 Archotech Power Helmets - 2 Archotech Power Armors
[h1]Research Prerequisite[/h1] - AdvancedFabrication
[h1]recipeUsers[/h1] - FabricationBench
Commissioned by me with the service of the extremely talented Jango D'soul here on the Workshop, through the "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Note[/h1] Compatibility with the following mods has been added: - More Archotech Garbage (Continued) - SOS2
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Rimworld - GeckoBoyer- XML attemptor lmao - JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder - Conan The Civilian- XML compatibility patch - Oskar Potocki and the whole VE Team - VE Framework
[url=https://discord.gg/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
